title: Please don't build Armor vs 2x Mage Carries.
body:
Especailly when they have a Trist with Rocket Jump and Buster Shot and a Shyvana that usually always does more Magic Damage than Physical Damage.

If you must build armor, build it as a 5th or 6th item and even then, Magic Resist and HP Would probably be better.

replies.body: Build armour when the other 3 guys deal physical damage and/or are fed.
Depends the champion see if I'm an ADC I don't wanna build magic resistance and health ({{item:3065}} {{item:3512}} and {{item:3102}} )

For everyone else though yes, and also for AD Carries Banshee's isn't bad vs full mage teams lol but I was speaking mainly of our support and top laner who both grabbed armor even though 80% of the damage in fights was magic sourced.

I was meaning as I don't wanna be building {{item:3065}} {{item:3512}} and {{item:3102}} as a 2,3 and 4 item.
{{item:3102}} is a 6th or 5th item depending how your game is going
I still get people building armour in lane against me as Azir, to this day i don't know why
{{item:3157}}  is fine tho (If I was a AP vs Azir) No I was not the summoner versing him I don't think I have versed this summoner b4 (Or at lest in a long time)
some questions are better left unanswered

They had Shyv, Sona, Swain, Katarina, Tristana. I meant building Armor is not a good idea versus 2 mage carries (Kat and Swain) while they have a Shyv and Trist too (So you're cutting half of half of shyv's damage as well as reducing the 2 AP's damage, but also carving some of the damage off trists Rocket Jump and Buster Shot. Like for reals 10% cost efficacy in that matchup of building armor and 90% cost efficacy of building MR.

Shyv is like 50:50 Physical to Magic but actually slants towards magic slightly.
Swain is 100% AP.
Katarina is 100% AP.
Sona is pretty much 100% AP.
Tristana is about 20-30% Magic, usually mainly Physical.

That is like 80% of their teams damage being magic and 2 people are building an armor item, when in team fights almost all of the damage is magic.

Complete waste of gold, when that much of the teams damage is magic. Like for reals you're getting like 10% cost effectiveness when you would have 90% cost effectiveness from MR.

I know trist isn't a mage carry but she still slightly loses out on dmg from MR, Shyv loses a chunk of damage from MR, Katarina loses a heap of Damage from MR, Swain loses a heap of damage from MR and Sona loses most of her Damage from MR and team - at Gold, is buying Armor items which makes 0 sense. Like ok you can take a few more hits from Trist, grats you are now Bursted down by Kat and hurt by Sona ults, Melted by Swain and laughed at as Shyvana Hybrid melts you mainly with burnout Damage and magic damage on - hit and Tristana's Buster shots will even wreck you.

MF Isn't a mage carry she gets like 20 Magic dmg on hit and has Make it Rain which does like 200 Damage, her ulti is physical and so is her double up - I understand MR helps more versus champs like Kog and Corki and to some extent Ez but if you are facing 2 AP Carries and they have a hybrid Jungler and a Sona (who is poke heavy) and they have a trist who herself even does a slight amount of magic dmg and you are building armor you are literally completely wasting Gold when you could have MR and not be wasting 80% of your gold considering 80% of the damage coming at you is Magic, stacking Armor is a bad idea.

Ah your original post wasn't very clear i thought you were calling Trist/Shyv mage carry's.

MF/Ezreal ADC carry around the same magic damage all up (i still don't understand why Ez's spam their W, it's a fucking utility spell)

Given the champ comp they had you were probably screwed regardless of resistance's as Pen builds are things that Kat's do cause base damage, and swain just amp's his damage anyway, it also depends on the situation though, if you can have Swain/Katarina removed from the fight before they can do damage, then armor is still the way to build, but of course MR should still be itemized.
Ezreal ADC now a days is like seeing a Yorick or Zilean been played, very rare. Ezreal is more a mage player now also Ezreal's W will not harm minions or jungle creeps
Will take this into account and possibly build Armor vs a team with 80% of their damage being Magic.

Armor is still incredibly important and should not be left too late even when there is a bunch of magic damage on the enemy team. When the mages don't have any abilities off cooldown, they auto, ADC's auto, Supports auto. Also, tanking turrets is a very helpful thing to have,

A Crap ton of magic damage and yes it should lol.

In fact you could even just not take it, most Armor scales harder than MR (Most Champions end the game with much higher base Armor than MR) making MR a stat often missed by most Champions and most MR Items give Raw HP Also which effectively negates a portion of Physical damage so picking up these items in a Double AP, 1 hybrid, 1 AD, 1 Support AP Matchup in no way leaves you exposed and is massively, massively more effective than Armor items, seeing +40 armor to your average at that point in the game of 40 is roughly a 25% Reduction in magic damage - from both those mages and +45 armor from a Sunfire is not going to be even 1/10th as effective.

Plus MR Items give you HP So the argument that armor items that give HP Are somehow negating more damage is dead wrong.

Tristana isn't a mage carry.

Mage Marksman are Kog/Corki and Ezreal/MF to an extent.

I don't know about Shyvana, but Trist is an ADC, so she's more commonly found dealing more auto damage instead of magic damage. She is not a primary mage.

And building armor is never a bad thing.   You're also not factoring the rest of the team.
Sure if they're all AP then don't buy armor. But if they're mixed and you're the tank, then buy a mixture of both. Maybe thrown in a thornmail if their ADC is fed, or a spirit visage if you have a Soraka on your team or something of that sort.
